name: The Thief & The Muse Present: Golden Grabbers
name_original: The Thief & The Muse Present: Golden Grabbers
description:
Hello, thanks for playing "The Thief & The Muse Present: Gold Grabber"!

 The Golden Rule is do unto others as you would have them do unto you. 

The Sneaks did this to The Thief & The Muse: they stole all their golden luckies! 

Play as The Thief to Steal back your golden luckies!

Pick up golden luckies and defeat Sneaks to increase your stack! 

Don't let the Sneaks beat you down! If your health bar goes below 0, it is game over!

Watch out for the cursed bronze luckies, as they will put your entire gold stack to 0!

Can you tell the difference between gold and bronze? 

Make sure you do, because there is no turning back! 

Talk to The Muse, Butterfly, and figure out how many golden luckies you need before you get to the end of the level. 

Get to Butterfly with the require amount of golden luckies to beat the level!

Open the Game by going through the two WindowsNoEditor Folders, then double click the Sneak_V_Sneak.exe file

Controls:

This game uses a XBox Controller. 

Use the left joystick to move left and right

Press 'Y' to Jump

Press 'X' to punch

This is a non-cannon version of "The Thief & The Muse", a 2 player split screen 3rd person adventure game, currently in development! Stay tuned for more information on this awesome adventure!
